itemDescription: Classic cheese pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and oregano.
Pizza topped with spicy pepperoni, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese.
Loaded with assorted vegetables like bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, black olives, and sweet corn, along with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Pizza topped with grilled chicken, bell peppers, onions, black olives, and mozzarella cheese, finished with tomato sauce.
Freshly baked breadsticks with a garlic and herb seasoning, served with tangy marinara sauce.
Tender and juicy chicken wings, available in various flavors like BBQ, Spicy, or Classic.
Warm and gooey chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
